SEARCH
Package com.ccprog3.myfarm.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.ccprog3.myfarm.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class. The Player class contains the following fields: coins, EXP, level, farmer type, and seed inventory. This also contains mostly getters and setters methods of each fields.
Author:
John Joseph F. Giron

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(float coins, String coinName)
      The constructor. Takes the starting amount of money in the game start, and the name of the currency.
      Parameters:
      coins - The starting amount of money. It is set at the game's constructor.
      coinName - The name of the currency.

  • Method Details

    • gainEXP

      public void gainEXP(float expGain)
      Adds expGain to the player's EXP field.
      Parameters:
      expGain - The amount of EXP to be added to the EXP stats.

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Raised the player's level.

    • gainCoins

      public void gainCoins(int coinsEarned)
      The earned money from harvesting. This is for integer arguments.
      Parameters:
      coinsEarned - The integer representation of earned amount of money.

    • gainCoins

      public void gainCoins(float coinsEarned)
      The earned money from harvesting. This is for floating-point arguments.
      Parameters:
      coinsEarned - The floating-point representation of earned amount of money.

    • loseCoins

      public void loseCoins(int coinsLost)
      The player pays an amount of money. Reduces the player's money. This only accepts integer argument.
      Parameters:
      coinsLost - The integer representation of payed amount of money.

    • loseCoins

      public void loseCoins(float coinsLost)
      The player pays an amount of money. Reduces the player's money. This only accepts float argument.
      Parameters:
      coinsLost - The floating-point representation of payed amount of money.

    • getEXP

      public float getEXP()
      Returns the player's EXP stat.
      Returns:
      Returns the player's EXP stat.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Returns the player's level. This is not the farmer status. They are separate concept.
      Returns:
      Returns the player's level.

    • getCoins

      public float getCoins()
      Returns the player's amount of money held.
      Returns:
      Returns the player's amount of money held.

    • getSeedInventory

      public int[] getSeedInventory()
      Returns an array that represents the player's seed inventory.
      Returns:
      Returns an array that represents the player's seed inventory.

    • resetStats

      public void resetStats()
      Resets all of the player's data.

    • addSeed

      public void addSeed(int idx, int quantity)
      Adds one seed to the player's inventory. Each index of the seed inventory array represents the seed in order:
      0 - Turnip
      1 - Carrot
      2 - Potato
      3 - Rose
      4 - Turnip Flower
      5 - Sunflower
      6 - Mango
      7 - Apple
      Parameters:
      idx - the index representation of the seed
      quantity - the number of seed to be added to the inventory

    • useSeed

      public void useSeed(int idx)
      Takes one seed from the player's inventory. Each index of the seed inventory array represents the seed in order:
      0 - Turnip
      1 - Carrot
      2 - Potato
      3 - Rose
      4 - Turnip Flower
      5 - Sunflower
      6 - Mango
      7 - Apple
      Parameters:
      idx - the index representation of the seed

    • register

      public void register()
      Promotes the player to the next farmer type.

    • getFarmerType

      public int getFarmerType()
      Returns the player's farmer type status.
      Returns:
      Returns an integer representation of the player's farmer type status.

    • reachedApex

      public boolean reachedApex()
      Checks if the player reaches the top farmer status.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the player reaches the top farmer status.
